Title: Shock and Owww!
Plot:
Shirley covertly asks Alan for help when nude photographs of her surface for auction.

Paul sends Brad in undercover when he suspects his daughter is once again using drugs, and Denny is inspired by a case involving self-defense electrocution.
Writer: Phoef Sutton, Sanford Golden, Karen Wyscarver
GuestStars: Jim Troesh,  Carolyn Lawrence,  Lakshmi Manchu,  Baadja-Lyne Odums,  Valerie Vaile,  Michele Moreno,  Dennis F. Chavis,  Suzanne Whang,  Carol Herman,  Ted Garcia,  Wesley Thompson,  April Rios,  Ashley Rios,  Ma
